post.author: zmzm
post.content:
Hi all,

I heard valuable information from a co-worker.
I want to share information to save your gas using
canadian tire gift card.

Basically you can get additional free $25 gift card
without charge if you purchase more than $250.

You can use the gift card at any canadian tire gas
station.

You can get 10% discount for gas.

1) Goto www.canadiantire.ca

2) click on GiftCard on the left tab.
http://www.canadiantire.ca/assortments/browse_product.jsp?FOLDER%3C%3Efolder_id=1408474396670189&ASSORTMENT%3C%3East_id=1408474396670271&bmUID=1124822845674&FOLDER%3C%3EbrowsePath=2534374303517524&FOLDER%3C%3EbrowsePath=1408474396670189

3) Only purchase $250(no more than $250)
You can see the free gift card. Once selecting $250,
enter 'giftcard' on promotion code.

4) Pay them by credit card.

5) You can get the card at home within 3 days.

6) Go to canadian tire gas station. pay for it by the
gift cards.

-zmzm
post.title: [Tip] How to get 10% gas discount
